trans-unit.source: Represents image data returned by a decoder and accepted by encoders.
trans-unit.target: Representa los datos de la imagen devueltos por un decodificador y aceptados por los codificadores.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame> provides additional functionality not defined by <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource> by providing access to the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame.Thumbnail%2A> associated with a particular frame of an image.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame> proporciona funciones adicionales no definidos en <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource> proporcionando acceso a la <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame.Thumbnail%2A> asociada a un marco determinado de una imagen.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame> also supports the writing of metadata information by using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.Metadata%2A> property or the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame.CreateInPlaceBitmapMetadataWriter%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame> también admite la escritura de información de metadatos utilizando la <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.Metadata%2A> propiedad o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame.CreateInPlaceBitmapMetadataWriter%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: Any <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame> returned from a decoder is always frozen.
trans-unit.target: Cualquier <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame> procedentes de un descodificador siempre está inmovilizado.

trans-unit.source: If you require a modifiable copy, you must first create a copy of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame> by using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.Clone%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Si necesita una copia modificable, primero debe crear una copia de la <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame> utilizando el <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.Clone%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: Only [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_tiff](~/includes/tlasharptla-tiff-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gif](~/includes/tlasharptla-gif-md.md)] format images support multiple frames.
trans-unit.target: Solo [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_tiff](~/includes/tlasharptla-tiff-md.md)] y [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gif](~/includes/tlasharptla-gif-md.md)] imágenes en formato admiten varios marcos.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to create a new <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource> by using a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame>.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo de código siguiente se muestra cómo crear un nuevo <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource> mediante el uso de un <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame>.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame> object to open a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_png](~/includes/tlasharptla-png-md.md)] graphic and write metadata by using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame.CreateInPlaceBitmapMetadataWriter%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo de código siguiente se muestra cómo utilizar el <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame> objeto para abrir un [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_png](~/includes/tlasharptla-png-md.md)] gráfico y escribir metadatos usando el <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame.CreateInPlaceBitmapMetadataWriter%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets or sets a value that represents the base <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> of the current context.
trans-unit.target: Cuando se invalida en una clase derivada, obtiene o establece un valor que representa la clase <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> base del contexto actual.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> of the current context.
trans-unit.target: Clase <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> base del contexto actual.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets a collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext" /> objects that are associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.
trans-unit.target: Cuando se invalida en una clase derivada, obtiene una colección de objetos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext" /> asociados a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.

trans-unit.source: A read-only collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext" /> objects that are associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.
trans-unit.target: Colección de solo lectura de los objetos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext" /> que están asociados a este objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> based on the supplied arguments.
trans-unit.target: Crea una nueva clase <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> basada en los argumentos proporcionados.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> that is used to construct the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> que se utiliza para crear <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> from a given <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />.
trans-unit.target: Crea un nuevo objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> a partir del identificador <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> from a given <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> a partir de un objeto <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: The `bitmapStream` can be closed after the frame is created only when the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption.OnLoad> cache option is used.
trans-unit.target: El `bitmapStream` puede cerrar después de la creación del marco solo cuando el <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption.OnLoad> se utiliza la opción de memoria caché.

trans-unit.source: The default <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption.OnDemand> cache option retains the stream until the frame is needed.
trans-unit.target: El valor predeterminado <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption.OnDemand> opción cache conserva la secuencia hasta que se necesita el marco.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame.Create%28System.IO.Stream%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCreateOptions%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption%29> method to specify create and cache options.
trans-unit.target: Use la <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame.Create%28System.IO.Stream%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCreateOptions%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption%29> método para especificar, crear y opciones de caché.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> that identifies the source of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.
trans-unit.target: Clase <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> que identifica el origen de la clase <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> from a given <see cref="T:System.Uri" />.
trans-unit.target: Crea un nuevo objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> a partir del identificador <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> from a given <see cref="T:System.Uri" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> a partir de un objeto <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to construct a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame> from a given <xref:System.Uri>.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo de código siguiente se muestra cómo construir un <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame> de un determinado <xref:System.Uri>.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource" /> that is used to construct this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource" /> que se utiliza para crear <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> from a given <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource" />.
trans-unit.target: Crea un nuevo objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> a partir del identificador <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> from a given <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> a partir de un objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: The location of the bitmap from which the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> is created.
trans-unit.target: Ubicación del mapa de bits a partir del que se crea el <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.

trans-unit.source: The caching requirements for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.
trans-unit.target: Requisitos de almacenamiento en caché de este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> from a given <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> with the specified <see cref="T:System.Net.Cache.RequestCachePolicy" />.
trans-unit.target: Crea <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> a partir de un <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> especificado con la <see cref="T:System.Net.Cache.RequestCachePolicy" /> especificada.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> from a given <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> with the specified <see cref="T:System.Net.Cache.RequestCachePolicy" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> a partir de un objeto <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> mediante la enumeración <see cref="T:System.Net.Cache.RequestCachePolicy" /> especificada.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame.Create%28System.Uri%2CSystem.Net.Cache.RequestCachePolicy%29> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame.Create%28System.Uri%2CSystem.Net.Cache.RequestCachePolicy%29> se introdujo en la versión 3.5 de .NET Framework.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
trans-unit.target: Para más información, vea [Versiones y dependencias](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

trans-unit.source: The source from which the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> is constructed.
trans-unit.target: Origen desde el que se crea <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.

trans-unit.source: A thumbnail image of the resulting <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.
trans-unit.target: Imagen en miniatura del <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> resultante.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> from a given <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource" /> with the specified thumbnail.
trans-unit.target: Crea una nueva <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> a partir de una <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource" /> especificada con la vista en miniatura especificada.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> from a given <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource" /> with the specified thumbnail.
trans-unit.target: Un <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> a partir de un objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource" /> mediante la miniatura especificada.

trans-unit.source: The stream from which this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> is constructed.
trans-unit.target: Secuencia de datos a partir de la que se construye <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.

trans-unit.source: The options that are used to create this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.
trans-unit.target: Opciones que se usan para crear este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.

trans-unit.source: The cache option that is used to create this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.
trans-unit.target: Opción de caché que se usa para crear este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> from a given <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> with the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCreateOptions" /> and <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption" />.
trans-unit.target: Crea una nueva <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> a partir de una <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> especificada con las enumeraciones <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCreateOptions" /> y <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption" /> especificadas.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> from a given <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> with the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCreateOptions" /> and <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> a partir de un objeto <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> mediante las enumeraciones <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCreateOptions" /> y <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption" /> especificadas.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption.OnLoad> cache option if you wish to close the `bitmapStream` after the bitmap is created.
trans-unit.target: Use la <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption.OnLoad> almacenar en caché opción si desea cerrar la `bitmapStream` después de crea el mapa de bits.

trans-unit.source: The default <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption.OnDemand> cache option retains access to the stream until the bitmap is needed and cleanup is handled by the garbage collector.
trans-unit.target: El valor predeterminado <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption.OnDemand> opción de caché mantiene el acceso a la secuencia hasta que se necesita el mapa de bits y limpieza está controlada por el recolector de elementos no utilizados.

trans-unit.source: The location of the bitmap from which the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> is created.
trans-unit.target: Ubicación del mapa de bits a partir del que se crea el <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.

trans-unit.source: The options that are used to create this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.
trans-unit.target: Opciones que se usan para crear este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.

trans-unit.source: The cache option that is used to create this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.
trans-unit.target: Opción de caché que se usa para crear este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> from a given <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> with the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCreateOptions" /> and <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption" />.
trans-unit.target: Crea <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> a partir de una <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> especificada con las enumeraciones <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCreateOptions" /> y <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption" /> especificadas.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> from a given <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> with the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCreateOptions" />, and <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> a partir de un objeto <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> mediante las enumeraciones <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCreateOptions" /> y <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption" /> especificadas.

trans-unit.source: The location of the bitmap from which the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> is created.
trans-unit.target: Ubicación del mapa de bits a partir del que se crea el <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.

trans-unit.source: The options that are used to create this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.
trans-unit.target: Opciones que se usan para crear este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.

trans-unit.source: The cache option that is used to create this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.
trans-unit.target: Opción de caché que se usa para crear este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.

trans-unit.source: The caching requirements for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.
trans-unit.target: Requisitos de almacenamiento en caché de este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> from a given <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> with the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCreateOptions" />, <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption" />, and <see cref="T:System.Net.Cache.RequestCachePolicy" />.
trans-unit.target: Crea <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> a partir de un <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> especificado con las <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCreateOptions" />, <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption" /> y <see cref="T:System.Net.Cache.RequestCachePolicy" /> especificadas.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> from a given <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> with the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCreateOptions" />, <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption" />, and <see cref="T:System.Net.Cache.RequestCachePolicy" />.
trans-unit.target: Un <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> a partir de un objeto <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> mediante las enumeraciones <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCreateOptions" />, <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption" /> y <see cref="T:System.Net.Cache.RequestCachePolicy" /> especificadas.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame.Create%28System.Uri%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCreateOptions%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption%2CSystem.Net.Cache.RequestCachePolicy%29> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame.Create%28System.Uri%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCreateOptions%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption%2CSystem.Net.Cache.RequestCachePolicy%29> se introdujo en la versión 3.5 de .NET Framework.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
trans-unit.target: Para más información, vea [Versiones y dependencias](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource" /> that is used to construct this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource" /> que se utiliza para crear <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.

trans-unit.source: A thumbnail image of the resulting <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.
trans-unit.target: Imagen en miniatura del <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> resultante.

trans-unit.source: The metadata to associate with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.
trans-unit.target: Los metadatos asociados a esta clase <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext" /> objects that are associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.
trans-unit.target: Los objetos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext" /> asociados con esta clase <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> from a given <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource" /> with the specified thumbnail, <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapMetadata" />, and <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext" />.
trans-unit.target: Crea <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> a partir de un elemento <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource" /> determinado con la miniatura especificada, <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapMetadata" /> y <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> from a given <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource" /> with the specified thumbnail, <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapMetadata" />, and <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext" />.
trans-unit.target: Un <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> a partir de un objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource" /> mediante las miniaturas <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapMetadata" /> y <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext" /> especificadas.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, creates an instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.InPlaceBitmapMetadataWriter" />, which can be used to associate metadata with a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.
trans-unit.target: Si se reemplaza en una clase derivada, crea una instancia de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.InPlaceBitmapMetadataWriter" />, que puede usarse para asociar metadatos a una clase <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.InPlaceBitmapMetadataWriter" />.
trans-unit.target: Una clase <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.InPlaceBitmapMetadataWriter" />.

trans-unit.source: Metadata can only be added or edited using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame.CreateInPlaceBitmapMetadataWriter%2A> if the image file contains enough room for the new metadata; otherwise, metadata can be added using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.Metadata%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Metadatos solo se puede agregar o editar mediante el <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame.CreateInPlaceBitmapMetadataWriter%2A> si el archivo de imagen contiene suficiente espacio para los nuevos metadatos; en caso contrario, metadatos se pueden agregar utilizando el <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.Metadata%2A> propiedad.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame> object to open a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_png](~/includes/tlasharptla-png-md.md)] graphic and write metadata by using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame.CreateInPlaceBitmapMetadataWriter%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo de código siguiente se muestra cómo utilizar el <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame> objeto para abrir un [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_png](~/includes/tlasharptla-png-md.md)] gráfico y escribir metadatos usando el <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame.CreateInPlaceBitmapMetadataWriter%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the decoder associated with this instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.
trans-unit.target: Cuando se invalida una clase derivada, se obtiene el decodificador asociado con esta instancia de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapDecoder" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapDecoder" /> asociado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the thumbnail image associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.
trans-unit.target: Si se reemplaza en una clase derivada, obtiene la imagen en miniatura asociada a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource" /> that represents a thumbnail of the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" />.
trans-unit.target: La clase <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource" /> que representa una vista en miniatura de la clase <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapFrame" /> actual.
